00026 //
00027 #include "broadutil/BroadUtil.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cerrno>
00030 #include <cstring>
00031 //
00032 
00033 void safe_strncpy(char *to, const char *from, size_t len)
00034 {
00035   strncpy(to, from, len);
00036   to[len] = '\0';
00037 }
00038 
00039 bool startswith(const char *target, const char *test)
00040 {
00041   return (strncmp(target, test, strlen(test)) == 0);
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool endswith(const char *str, const char * suffix)
00045 {
00046   size_t len = strlen(str);
00047   size_t suffixLen = strlen(suffix);
00048   if (len < suffixLen) {
00049     return false;
00050   }
00051   return strcmp(str + len - suffixLen, suffix) == 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 FILE *fopen_check(const char *fname, const char *mode)
00055 {
00056   FILE *strm = fopen(fname, mode);
00057   if (strm == NULL) {
00058     throw BroadException("Could not open file", __FILE__, __LINE__, fname, errno);
00059   }
00060   return strm;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void fclose_check(FILE *fp)
00064 {
00065   ;
00066   if (fclose(fp) != 0) {
00067     throw BroadException("Could not close file", __FILE__, __LINE__, "", errno);
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void fwrite_check(const void *data, size_t size, size_t nitems, FILE *fp)
00072 {
00073   size_t ret = fwrite(data, size, nitems, fp);
00074   if (ret != nitems) {
00075     throw BroadException("Problem writing file", __FILE__, __LINE__, "", errno);
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void fread_check(void *data, size_t size, size_t nitems, FILE *fp)
00080 {
00081   size_t ret = fread(data, size, nitems, fp);
00082   if (ret != nitems) {
00083     throw BroadException("Problem writing file", __FILE__, __LINE__, "", errno);
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void fseek_check(FILE *stream, long offset, int whence)
00088 {
00089   int ret = fseek(stream, offset, whence);
00090   if (ret != 0) {
00091     throw BroadException("Error fseeking", __FILE__, __LINE__, "", errno);
00092   }
00093 }
00094 
00095 long ftell_check(FILE *stream)
00096 {
00097   long ret = ftell(stream);
00098   if (ret == -1) {
00099     throw BroadException("Error ftelling", __FILE__, __LINE__, "", errno);
00100   }
00101   return ret;
00102 }
